name: Package
description:
This fan game is a mix of visual novel and POINT & CLICK genres. Created solely for the purpose of learning how to work with the Renpy engine and release games on the Steam platform. Distribution of the game is absolutely free.

The game was created based on the lore of the character 'Anna Amur Tiger'.

All rights to the characters belong to their owners - links can be found in the main menu item "About"

In this game you have to deliver a package to Anna! Find out where the tiger is hiding! Deliver the package and don't stop until you succeed. Remember, nothing is what it seems...

You will find several endings, many secrets, references, dead ends... Explore the house inside and out, and find everything you can.

Attention - English is presented in the form of machine translation.
